p: The antimicrobial characteristics of some nanomaterials depend on their size, shape, surface features, and surface charge. As a result, their toxicological effects are controllable by the employed concentration (Sportelli et al. 2020). The toxic levels of NPs must be taken into consideration before designing any nano-drug, and the antimicrobial minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) should be measured (Abdel Maksoud et al. 2020; El-Batal et al. 2020).
